Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{3: 'Inside the rumbling transport craft, Gray Raven heads back toward Babylonia.'}
{3: 'Swayed by the turbulence, you soon doze off. The half-written mission report slips from your grasp, coming to rest on the knee of the Construct seated beside.'}
{3: 'The black-haired Construct girl quietly picks up the notebook.'}
{1: 'Conservation Area Support Request', 2: '000000ff', 3: '0.7', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Commission Rank: B', 2: '000000ff', 3: '0.5', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{1: 'Issued By: Surface Conservation Area', 2: '000000ff', 3: '0.6', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 7: '1'}

{1: "<para\\>Mission Details: Evacuate any nearby inhabitants and gather the specified items within this zone. <para\\>We request additional personnel to collaborate with the stationed Task Force members to ensure the operation's success.", 2: '000000ff', 3: '2', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png', 6: '1', 7: '1', 9: '1'}
{3: "Beneath the mission overview, the familiar, hurried handwriting circles the conservation area's ID."}
{1: '1', 3: "This is the same Conservation Zone where, two years ago—on Lucia's Activation Date—she undertook a lone support mission."}
{3: 'Marked as one of the backup missions.'}
{3: 'Under the paper, several mission names are crossed out in a hurried scrawl.'}
{3: "The other missions just don't seem suitable."}
{3: 'This one should be good.'}
{3: 'Taking on this mission will give Lucia a chance to rest—switching to her new frame has been draining...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Off to the side, you shift your neck, possibly because of an awkward sleeping position, or maybe you caught Lucia's faint call."}
{3: 'She gently straightens your posture, settling you against her shoulder in a more comfortable way.'}
{3: 'The pen scratches quietly over the page, and in no time, the mission report is filled out.'}
{3: 'Lucia gently closes the notebook, her gaze drifting over the distant landscape outside the window. For once, her mind wanders in a rare moment of reverie.'}
{3: 'After a brief pause, the black-haired Construct girl slowly closes her eyes and leans toward her commandant—her trusted haven of peace.'}
{3: 'In her dream, Froggie has found its own four-leaf clover at last.'}
